title: HotelsArea.com - SECURITY INFO
content: SECURITY INFO All information we collect from you is gathered when you are on our secure server. The secure server, which is signed by RapidSSL, means that information is transferred securely between your computer and the HotelsArea.com server and that no third parties can intercept and read and use the data. The padlock symbol on your browser indicates you are on a secure server.
